Control Statement: The information system conceals, via the session lock, information previously visible on the display with a publicly viewable image.Supplemental Guidance:  Publicly viewable images can include static or dynamic images, for example, patterns used with screen savers, photographic images, solid colors, clock, battery life indicator, or a blank screen, with the additional caveat that none of the images convey sensitive information.References:  OMB Memorandum 06-16.
